tool_description: Get Movies and TV Shows data with ratings from multiple providers in JSON format
name: MDBList
title: MDBList

api_list.name: Search by Title
api_list.description: Search for Movies or TV Shows by title, include option year or mediatype filter to narrow your results

required_parameters.name: s
required_parameters.description: Movie or TV Show Title to search

optional_parameters.name: l
optional_parameters.description:
Limit returned items.
You can use numbes from 1 to 100 (default is 50)

optional_parameters.name: y
optional_parameters.description: Year (format YYYY, for example 2020) to limit title search (would also include previous and next year movies)

optional_parameters.name: m
optional_parameters.description: Search for only movie or tv show, leave empty for both

api_list.name: Get by Trakt.tv ID
api_list.description: Returns movie or TV Show info

api_list.name: Get by IMDb ID
api_list.description: Returns movie or TV Show info by IMDb ID

api_list.name: Get by TMDb ID
api_list.description: Returns movie or TV Show info

api_list.name: Get by TVDB ID
